description:
Dispatches HTTP request and outputs response or error.

More: https://github.com/Cranq-io/cranq-tutorials/tree/main/http_request

7468e859-6176-4c54-a03a-9039e7024bed.name: method
7468e859-6176-4c54-a03a-9039e7024bed.description:
Receives http method. Indicates the desired action to be performed for a given target or resource.

Example:
"GET"

e69367fe-1abe-4422-a70a-4d67c614f464.name: url
e69367fe-1abe-4422-a70a-4d67c614f464.description:
Receives the target of the HTTP request. Also called "resource" 

Example:
"https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/todos/1"

50a82f4b-f270-470f-872e-f7f6f2f0fc36.name: headers

f11b9873-7a11-4241-9e17-a16496cf783e.name: body
f11b9873-7a11-4241-9e17-a16496cf783e.description:
Receives the http request body. Some requests send data to the server in order to update it. In case of GET or DELETE request the body should be empty (will be ignored).

Example:
""

09b13a33-348d-458b-b43f-5013a45f4893.name: status
09b13a33-348d-458b-b43f-5013a45f4893.description:
Sends http response status code. Indicates whether the request has been  successfully completed.

Example:
200

d057c749-d7a8-4108-adcc-31eb1878349b.name: headers

498b10a6-ba52-43d0-a28a-73dc43eaf048.name: body
498b10a6-ba52-43d0-a28a-73dc43eaf048.description:
Sends http response message body data.

Example:
"{\"userId\": 1, \"id\": 1, \"title\": \"delectus aut autem\",  \"completed\": false
}"

4991414b-16a6-4a01-a988-c841eac995c7.name: error

name: io/http/Request dispatcher
